questions.question: How do I reset my CCMS password?

steps.text: Please contact your Clinic system administrator (MOIC/PPP/FMS)
Admin will give you a new temporary pasword
Log in using the temporary password and change to the new desired password
Accounts are automatically locked after 3-5 failed login attempts for security purposes. Please contact your clinic admin.

questions.question: How do I search for a patient record?

steps.text:
You can search for patient records using:
• IC Number (most accurate)
• Patient ID/MRN
• Name (surname first, then given name)
• Contact number
Navigate to the 'Patient Search' module and enter at least one search criterion
Click 'Search'. Results will display matching records. Click on a record to view full details.
Ensure you have appropriate access permissions for the department.

questions.question: What do I do if patient information is incorrect?

steps.text: Do NOT modify demographic data directly
Contact the Registration Department at ext. 3200
Submit a 'Patient Data Amendment Form' (Form CCMS-001)
Provide supporting documentation (IC copy, proof of address, etc.)
Amendments are typically processed within 2 working days. For clinical data corrections, follow your department's clinical documentation amendment protocol.

questions.question: How to print the same content duplicated side-by-side on one physical page (e.g., two identical halves on A4), using LibreOffice Write

steps.text: Buka consultation yang anda nak print.
Tekan Print.
Dalam ruangan Pages, taip: 1, 1  (Ini bermaksud: Print halaman 1 dua kali)
Di bahagian Pages per Sheet, pilih 2 pages per sheet.
Pastikan susunan (Order) adalah Left → Right dan Page Layout dalam keadaan Landscape
Tekan Print.

Hasilnya: Satu kertas A4 akan ada dua salinan consultation yang sama, diletakkan side-by-side. Ketatapan ini adalah sesuai untuk digunakan bagi kegunaan Maternal and Child Health Clinic di mana ia memerlukan dua salinan fizikal

questions.question: Prescription window terlampau besar bila tekan “Create Repeat” (terjadi kepada laptop yang beresolusi rendah)

steps.text:
Tukar Windows Display Scaling : 
• Right click desktop → Display settings
• Scale → 125%
(Nota: Font CCMS akan jadi kecil lepas ni)

New stepBetulkan Font CCMS supaya senang baca
• Buka CCMS → User → PC Setting → User Interface → Font Size → Font Size Adjustment
• Naikkan ikut keselesaan (eg :+1 / +2)

Hasil:
Window “Create Repeat” akan muat screen semula & OK button boleh nampak.
Font CCMS pun kekal jelas dan tidak terlalu kecil

questions.question: Registering a newborn without IC Number

steps.text:
Register a patient ✓ At the search button, fill the name as ‘Baby of
Mother’s Name’ and fill in the baby’s Date of
Birth and click ‘Search’.
✓ Leave the IC Number field empty, but fill the
Parent/Guardian ID. Please ensure that the age
of baby is less than 1 year old for the field
‘Parent/Guardian ID’ to appear.

2. Fill in other registration details
✓ Complete the registration by filling in other fields
eg: MRN, Patient’s Name and Gender.
✓ Choose MRN ‘01’ for first child and ‘02’ for
second child and follow through.

✓ Click OK and Save to finish registering the
newborn.

3. A Newborn’s profile with Parent’s ID will
be created

4. To search the Newborn’s profile
✓ Find the Newborn using the ‘Parent/Guardian ID’
by clicking the ‘Advanced’ button.

✓ All newborn using the ‘Parent/Guardian ID’ will
be visible.

✓ To change or add the IC number (once the child
has it), click on the button ‘Security Controlled
Procedure’ to add the new IC number.
✓ Then, click on "Update pt demographic details" to
change baby's name or update any baby's
demographic details.
✓ Click OK and Save to confirm changes.
